channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 152: Relationships: Pastors & Congregants [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron discusses a topic that isn't discussed very often- What should the relationship between a pastor and the congregation look like? What could church-goers improve upon, and what could pastors improve upon. All of that and more in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock!

 

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/

Beachhead Media YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTRwY4I8_rSQ7Z6I05k8lkA
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 151: Relationships: Parents & Children [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron holds nothing back in his advice on what a healthy parent-child relationship should look like. Everything from discipline, household culture, speaking into your children's lives, all the way to how to act when your children have children of their own is covered in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock.

 

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/

Beachhead Media YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTRwY4I8_rSQ7Z6I05k8lkA
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
